short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Development environment for Chrome OS and Chrome Borwser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What's New

* Added settings
* Change theme from settings
* Improved stability

Puresolid for Chrome is a new web development environment offering tools for development. Use light-weighted Puresolid to create new web based projects or open locally stored projects and start to work. Using Puresolid IDE, you may create Chrome and Web applications.
Supported Programming Languages and Files
• Javascript
• CSS
• HTML
• PHP
• XML
• JSON

Features include
• Create new applications
• Open existing applications
• Multifunctional source editor with autocomplete
• Nested web server for running web applications
• Store application files locally
• Open locally stored applications

User experience
• Keyboard shortcuts for the seasoned users
• Full screen mode allows for undisturbed concentration
• Drag and drop files from PC
• Intuitive and well-mastered interface

The easiest way for developers to create, edit and run Chrome Apps and Web Apps.
